layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x118
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x118
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x86
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18 [color=#000080]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 332x18
          text run at (0,0) width 332: "The two blocks below should have the same height."
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (80,34) size 102x52
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 102x52
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 102x48
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 48x48 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (4,4) size 40x40 [color=#000080]
                LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 40x40
                  text run at (0,0) width 40: "\x{C9}"
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (52,2) size 48x40 [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (4,4) size 40x32 [border: (32px solid #000080) none]
